t: Instagram Reels for Amazon Businesses - AMZ Advisers
s: February 9, 2024 - With this new feature, sellers can tag items to reels. Users can tap on a “View Products” button. This way, viewers can learn about, save, or buy the tagged product. t: Amazon Nova Reel - AWS AI Service Cards
s: Amazon Nova Reel generates a novel video from a descriptive natural language text string and an optional reference image (together, the “prompt”). Customers can use Amazon Nova Reel to create content within advertising, branding, product design, and social media workflows.
